actions.parameters: 4;Any;Objective: don't let enemies capture the tower in the middle of the Oasis.
4;Any;You will win, if you manage to hold on for 90 minutes.
4;Any;Player1 can change difficulty by moving units into the circle on the right.
4;Any;The more swordmen you move, the more difficult the game will be.
4;Any;You have until the in-game time reaches two minutes to decide.
4;Any;Players 4, 5, 6, 7 and 8 must be controlled by the new AI.
4;Any;There needs to be at least 1 soldier in the circle in the north.
4;Any;The resources have arrived! You have 6 minutes to pick them up! [1/7];;;

4;Any;The resources have arrived! You have 6 minutes to pick them up! [3/7];;;

4;Any;The resources have arrived! You have 6 minutes to pick them up! [7/7];;;
4;Any;You selected difficulty level 19. Good luck. You will need it.
4;Any;Level 20? Remember, there can be no bravery without madness.
4;Any;Capturing corner towers is forbidden. You lose!;;;
4;Any;Wrong config. Player 3 cannot be human when Player 2 is AI.;;;
4;Any;Send beer, sake, wine or mead to the middle tower to call reinforcements.;;;
